name: Thrill Digger Demake
description:
This is a demake of the Thrill Digger minigame from The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword.

Use X or Space to dig the area with your shovel. If you hit a bomb, it's game over.

Green rupee: Gives 1 point, and indicates that there are 0 bad zones around it.

Blue rupee: Gives 5 points, and indicates that there are 1-2 bad zones around it.

Red rupee: Gives 20 points, and indicates that there are 3-4 bad zones around it.

Silver rupee: Gives 100 points, and indicates that there are 5-6 bad zones around it.

Gold rupee: Gives 500 points, and indicates that there are 7-8 bad zones around it.

Black rupee: Makes you lose 1 point. This counts as a bad zone, as well as the bombs.

To start the game, choose your difficulty!

1: four bombs, zero black rupees, 16 rupees.

2: four bombs, four black rupees, 22 rupees.

3: eight bombs, eight black rupees, 24 rupees.

The harder difficulties also have bigger areas to dig!

Share your high scores, thoughts, and bug reports in the comments!
